subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Tom Savage of Pittsburgh, who played for three programs in five years, was selected by the Texans. A punter who went to the Bears was the first special-teams player picked.
snippet: Tom Savage of Pittsburgh, who played for three programs in five years, was selected by the Texans. A punter who went to the Bears was the first special-teams player picked.
